      • clearOffsetsBefore

        public Set<Long> clearOffsetsBefore(Long kafkaOffset)
        Description copied from interface: FailedMsgRetryManager

        Clear any offsets before kafkaOffset. These offsets are no longer available in kafka.

        Returns:
